_xResult.title: A Modern Woman Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made midi dress with checkered pattern
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made plaid dress is a beautiful statement piece in the most understated way. The classic silhouette is oversized and asymmetrical, the sleeves are perfectly short and cuffed and the dart lines add an elegant touch of sophisticated class. You can wear this to the office and all night afterwards—when you sport this dress, you’ll never want to take it off.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
